question:
You have unexpectedly come into a large sum of money and you want to share this good news
with your friend.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
● explain where the money came from
● say what you intend to do with the money
● invite your friend to celebrate your good fortune.
text: I'm fine, and I hope you are doing good too. I feel delighted to share a piece of good news that I won a prize bond, which I had bought a few months ago.

As you know, I had purchased some prize bond from my pocket money. Although I was not sure at the time of purchase, I will really win it. But, when I received a call from a bank representative that I had won the prize of amount one million dollars, my joy knew no bounds, and I thanked God for His mercy upon me.

What is more important, because it is a huge amount, it should be spent wisely. So I’m planning that I'll divide this money into chunks, and donate a handsome amount for charity to an organization which is located. I'll also pay my university fees for the remaining semesters.

I’d like to invite you this weekend to be a part of my happiness. I’m planning to throw a party at a five-star restaurant to celebrate this great news. If you are not available this weekend, I will shift this event to the next date for your convenience.
Let me know about your plans at the earliest.
